name: Grinning Face
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes and a broad, closed smile.

name: Grinning Face with Big Eyes
description: A yellow face with simple, open eyes and a broad, open smile.

name: Grinning Face with Smiling Eyes
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes and a broad, closed smile.

name: Beaming Face with Smiling Eyes
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes and a broad, open smile.

name: Grinning Squinting Face
description: A yellow face with a broad, open smile, showing upper teeth on most platforms, with tightly closed eyes.

name: Face with Monocle
description: A face with one eyebrow raised, wearing a monocle.

name: Grinning Face with Sweat
description: A yellow face with a big grin and scrunched, X-shaped eyes, tilted on its side as if rolling on the floor laughing.

name: Face with Tears of Joy
description: A yellow face with a big grin and scrunched, X-shaped eyes, tilted on its side as if rolling on the floor laughing.

name: Rolling on the Floor Laughing
description: A yellow face with a big grin and scrunched, X-shaped eyes, tilted on its side as if rolling on the floor laughing.

name: Smiling Face with Tear
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes and a single tear on one cheek.

name: Smiling Face
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes and a broad, closed smile.

name: Smiling Face with Smiling Eyes
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes and a broad, closed smile.

name: Smiling Face with Halo
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes, closed smile, and halo, usually above the head.

name: Slightly Smiling Face
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes and a closed smile.

name: Upside-Down Face
description: A yellow face with a slight smile and a slight frown, which can be inverted or flipped upside down.

name: Winking Face
description: A yellow face with a slight smile and a wink.

name: Relieved Face
description: A yellow face with soft, closed eyes, raised eyebrows, and a slight smile.

name: Smiling Face with Heart-Eyes
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes, a closed smile, and hearts circling around its head, expressing love or adoration.

name: Smiling Face with Hearts
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes, a closed smile, and several hearts floating around its head.

name: Face Blowing a Kiss
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes and puckered lips blowing a kiss, depicted as a red heart.

name: Kissing Face
description: A yellow face with puckered lips, closed eyes, and a slight blush.

name: Kissing Face with Smiling Eyes
description: A yellow face with kissing lips, eyes closed, and smiling with a blush.

name: Kissing Face with Closed Eyes
description: A yellow face with puckered lips, closed eyes, and a slight blush.

name: Face Savoring Food
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes, closed smile, and a tongue sticking out, tasting delicious food.

name: Face with Tongue
description: A yellow face with a big grin and wide, white eyes, one larger than the other, and a tongue sticking out.

name: Squinting Face with Tongue
description: A yellow face with scrunched, X-shaped eyes and a big grin, sticking its tongue out.

name: Winking Face with Tongue
description: A yellow face with a small, closed smile, one raised eyebrow, and its tongue sticking out, often used to convey a sense of joking or teasing.

name: Zany Face
description: A yellow face with a big grin, uplifted eyebrows, and smiling eyes, each shedding a tear from laughing so hard.

name: Face with Raised Eyebrow
description: A yellow face with a single, raised eyebrow, mistrustful or disapproving.

name: Face with Monocle
description: A face with one eyebrow raised, wearing a monocle.

name: Nerd Face
description: A yellow face with thick, black glasses and buck teeth, a stereotypical nerd.

name: Smiling Face with Sunglasses
description: A yellow face with a broad, closed smile wearing black sunglasses, as if a cool dude.

name: Disguised Face
description: A face with one large and one small eye, a slight frown, and furrowed eyebrows, as if trying to deceive.

name: Star-Struck
description: A yellow face with starry eyes, wide raised eyebrows, and a broad, closed smile.

name: Party Face
description: A face wearing a party hat, with a paper horn blowing and confetti streaming down.

name: Mixed Skin Tone
description: A face with one hand pointing upwards, and the other pointing downwards, with a yellow face.

name: Smirking Face
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes and a closed smile with a smirk.

name: Unamused Face
description: A yellow face with slightly raised eyebrows, a frown, and eyes looking to the side. May convey a variety of negative emotions, including irritation, displeasure, and skepticism.

name: Multiple skin tones
description: A face with one hand pointing to the left, the other pointing to the right, with a yellow face.

name: Disappointed Face
description: A yellow face with a slight frown, downturned eyebrows, and eyes looking to the side. May convey a range of negative emotions, including disappointment, frustration, sadness, and remorse.

name: Pensive Face
description: A yellow face with slightly raised eyebrows, a frown, and eyes looking down. May convey a variety of moderately sad or pensive emotions, including longing, contemplation, disappointment, and loneliness.

name: Worried Face
description: A yellow face with a small, open mouth and large, downcast eyes, as if worried and unhappy.

name: Confused Face
description: A yellow face with open eyes and a skewed frown, as if scrunching its cheeks or chewing its lips in confusion.

name: Slightly Frowning Face
description: A yellow face with simple, open eyes and a slight frown.

name: Frowning Face
description: A yellow face with simple, open eyes and a frown.

name: Persevering Face
description: A yellow face with closed eyes, furrowed eyebrows, and a broad, open frown, as if distraught to the point of giving up.

name: Confounded Face
description: A yellow face with furrowed eyebrows, a small, open frown, and eyes looking up and to the side.

name: Tired Face
description: A yellow face with closed eyes, furrowed eyebrows, and a broad, open frown, as if distraught to the point of giving up.

name: Weary Face
description: A yellow face with closed eyes and a frown, as if tired and weary.

name: Pleading Face
description: A yellow face with closed eyes, a small, closed mouth, and a pleading expression. Often conveys a sense of begging or imploring.

name: Crying Face
description: A yellow face with raised eyebrows and a slight frown, shedding a single, blue tear from one eye down its cheek. May convey a moderate degree of sadness or pain.

name: Loudly Crying Face
description: A yellow face with an open mouth wailing and streams of heavy tears flowing from closed eyes. May convey inconsolable grief but also other intense feelings, such as uncontrollable laughter or overwhelming joy.

name: Face with Steam From Nose
description: A yellow face with closed eyes, furrowed eyebrows, and a broad, open frown, as if distraught to the point of giving up.

name: Angry Face
description: A yellow face with a frowning mouth and eyes and eyebrows scrunched downward in anger.

name: Pouting Face
description: A yellow face with scrunched, X-shaped eyes and a frown, as if aching with rage.

name: Face with Symbols on Mouth
description: A face with symbols on the mouth, showing air going out, as if the face is swearing.

name: Exploding Head
description: A yellow face with an open mouth, the top of its head exploding in the shape of a mushroom cloud.

name: Flushed Face
description: A yellow face with wide, blank eyes, and a small, open frown. Its face is red and its mouth is open, with a raised eyebrow.

name: Hot Face
description: A red face with a scrunched, X-shaped eyes, furrowed eyebrows, and a frown, as if overheated from high temperatures.

name: Cold Face
description: A blue face with a scrunched, X-shaped eyes, furrowed eyebrows, and a frown, as if cold from low temperatures.

name: Face in Clouds
description: A face with closed eyes and a cloud of smoke around it, as if in a fog.

name: Face Screaming in Fear
description: A yellow face with open eyes, raised eyebrows, and a mouth open, as if in fear or horror.

name: Fearful Face
description: A yellow face with open eyes, raised eyebrows, and a mouth open, as if in fear or horror.

name: Anxious Face with Sweat
description: A yellow face with open eyes, raised eyebrows, and a mouth open, as if in fear or horror.

name: Sad but Relieved Face
description: A yellow face with closed eyes, raised eyebrows, and a small, open smile, as if aching with sadness and pain.

name: Downcast Face with Sweat
description: A yellow face with closed eyes, furrowed eyebrows, and a small, open smile, as if aching with sadness and pain.

name: Hugging Face
description: A yellow face with open hands, as if giving a hug.

name: Thinking Face
description: A yellow face with a hand resting on its chin and a pondering expression.

name: Fog
description: A symbol that is a cloud in a fog.

name: Face with Hand Over Mouth
description: A yellow face with wide, open eyes, a slight frown, and large, open hands covering its mouth.

name: Lightning
description: A symbol that is a lightning bolt.

name: Tornado
description: A symbol that is a tornado.

name: Shushing Face
description: A yellow face with wide, open eyes, a slight frown, and a finger pressed against its closed mouth.

name: Comet
description: A symbol that is a comet.

description: A yellow face with eyes closed, mouth open, and a blue snot bubble coming out of its nose. It's sleeping.

name: Drooling Face

name: Sleepy Face
description: A yellow face with closed eyes, mouth open, and a blue snot bubble coming out of its nose. It's sleeping.
